Verses: 1 en Naavinaal Paavanjeyyaadhabadikku Naan En Vazhigalaik Kaaththu, Dhunmaarkkan Enakku Munbaaga Irukkumattum En Vaayaik Kadivaalaththaal Adakkivaippen Endren.
2 naan Mavunamaagi, Oomaiyanaayirundhen, Nalamaanadhaiyum Pesaamal Amarndhirundhen; Aanaalum En Dhukkam Adhigariththadhu;
3 en Irudhayam Enakkulle Analkondadhu; Naan Dhiyaanikkaiyil Akkini Moondadhu; Appozhudhu En Naavinaal Vinnappam Seydhen.
4 karththaave, Naan Evvalavaai Nilaiyatravan Endru Unarumpadi En Mudivaiyum, En Naatkalin Alavu Ivvalavu Enbadhaiyum Enakkuth Theriviyum.
5 idho, En Naatkalai Naalu Virarkadaiyalavaakkineer; En Aayusu Umadhu Paarvaikku Illaadhadhupolirukkiradhu; Endha Manushanum Maayaiye Enbadhu Nichchayam. (selaa.)
6 veshamaagave Manushan Thirigiraan; Virudhaavaagave Sanjalappadugiraan; Aasdhiyaich Serkkiraan, Yaar Adhai Vaarikkolluvaan Endru Ariyaan.
7 ippodhum Aandavare, Naan Edharku Edhirpaarththirukkiren? Neere En Nambikkai.
8 en Meerudhalgal Ellaavatrilumirundhu Ennai Vidudhalaiyaakkum, Moodanudaiya Nindhanaikku Ennai Oppukkodaadheyum.
9 neere Idhaich Seydheer Endru Naan En Vaayaith Thiravaamal Mavunamaayirundhen.
10 ennilirundhu Ummudaiya Vaadhaiyai Eduththuppodum; Umadhukaraththin Adigalaal Naan Sorndhuponen.
11 akkiramaththinimiththam Neer Manushanaik Kadindhukondu Dhandikkirapodhu, Avan Vadivaip Pottarippaippol Azhiyappannugireer; Nichchayamaaga Endha Manushanum Maayaiye. (selaa.)
12 karththaave, En Jebaththaikkettu, En Kooppidudhalukkuch Sevikodum; En Kanneerukku Mavunamaayiraadheyum; En Pidhaakkalellaaraiyumpola Naanum Umakkumunbaaga Anniyanum Paradhesiyumaayirukkiren.
13 naan Ini Iraamarpogumunne Therudhaladaiyumpadi Ennidaththil Porumaiyaayirum.
